aws::graph::propositions: # Meteorological Information and Flight Plan for Accident at Morristown Municipal Airport
Conditions at the accident site were Instrument Meteorological Conditions (IMC).
The condition of light at the accident site was Day.
The observation facility was Morristown Municipal Airport (MMU).
Morristown Municipal Airport (MMU) has an elevation of 187 feet mean sea level.
The observation facility was 0 Nautical Miles from the accident site.
The observation time was 12:50 Local.
The observation facility was 290° from the accident site.
The lowest ceiling was Overcast at 300 feet Above Ground Level (AGL).
The wind speed was 3 knots.
The wind direction was 270°.
There was no turbulence forecast.
There was no actual turbulence.
Turbulence severity forecast was Not Applicable.
Turbulence severity actual was Not Applicable.
The altimeter setting was 29.56 inches of mercury (Hg).
The temperature was 9°C.
The dew point was -1°C.
Precipitation and obscuration was Moderate with Fog and no precipitation.
The departure point was Olean, NY (OLE).
The type of flight plan filed was Instrument Flight Rules (IFR).
The destination was Morristown, NJ (MMU).
The type of clearance was Instrument Flight Rules (IFR).
The departure time was 10:50 Local.
The type of airspace was Class D.

text:
# Meteorological Information and Flight Plan

## Conditions at Accident Site: Instrument (IMC)
Condition of Light: Day

## Observation Facility, Elevation: MMU,187 ft msl
Distance from Accident Site: 0 Nautical Miles

## Observation Time: 12:50 Local
Direction from Accident Site: 290°

## Lowest Cloud Condition: 
Visibility

## Lowest Ceiling: Overcast / 300 ft AGL
Visibility (RVR):

## Wind Speed/Gusts: 3 knots /
Turbulence Type Forecast/Actual: None / None

## Wind Direction: 270°
Turbulence Severity Forecast/Actual: N/A / N/A

## Altimeter Setting: 29.56 inches Hg
Temperature/Dew Point: 9°C / -1°C

## Precipitation and Obscuration: Moderate - None - Fog

## Departure Point: Olean, NY (OLE )
Type of Flight Plan Filed: IFR

## Destination: Morristown, NJ (MMU )
Type of Clearance: IFR

## Departure Time: 10:50 Local
Type of Airspace: Class D
